titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide flexibility in the manner in which beds are counted for purposes of determining whether a hospital may be designated as a critical access hospital under the Medicare program and to exempt from the critical access hospital inpatient bed limitation the number of beds provided for certain veterans.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S791)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
